title: Twisted slayer helmet

properties.name: description
properties.value: The twisted slayer helmet is a piece of equipment that is worn in the helmet slot. It is a cosmetic upgrade to the slayer helmet.

content:
This article is about the regular twisted slayer helmet. For the imbued version, see twisted slayer helmet (i).
Twisted slayer helmet
Released16 January 2020 (Update)

The twisted slayer helmet is a piece of equipment that is worn in the helmet slot. It is a cosmetic upgrade to the slayer helmet.

It can be created by adding twisted horns after purchasing the ability Twisted Vision for 1,000 Slayer reward points from any Slayer master. This is reversible, and the horns will be returned to the inventory along with the slayer helmet's components. The horns will be lost on death in PVP.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-6-2
 Defence bonuses
+30+32+27-1+30
 Other bonusesSlot
+0+0+0%+0List

Treasure Trails[edit | edit source]

Tier Emotes STASH Location Items Cost
Master Raspberry Warriors' Guild bank 2,410,841[c 1]
  1. ^ The cost may be higher because of the variant of the item used. The base item is slayer helmet.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
23 January 2020
(update)

The examine text was slightly changed; previously, it was "You don't want to wear it inside-out."

16 January 2020
(update)

The item is now obtainable.

14 November 2019
(update)

The item was added to the game.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The twisted slayer helmet is one of the two variants (alongside the hydra variant) of the slayer helmet that are not named after a colour.

[[File:Twisted slayer helmet detail.png|left|140px]]
[[File:Twisted slayer helmet chathead.png|left]]
The '''twisted slayer helmet''' is a piece of equipment that is worn in the helmet slot. It is a cosmetic upgrade to the [[slayer helmet]].

It can be created by adding [[twisted horns]] after purchasing the ability ''Twisted Vision'' for 1,000 [[Slayer reward point]]s from any [[Slayer master]]. This is reversible, and the horns will be returned to the inventory along with the slayer helmet's components. The horns will be lost on death in PVP.
